metadata.title: CVE-2024-27419 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: netrom:Fix data-races around sysctl_net_busy_read We need to protect the readerreading the sysctl value because the value can be changed concurrently.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
